BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exit surveys and interviews for resigning and retiring employees of city agencies
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exit surveys and interviews for resigning and retiring employees of city agencies.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S. 1828 /A. 3103, which would eliminate the subminimum wage for employees based on their disability or age.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminate the subminimum wage for employees based on their disability or age. (S. 1828 /A. 3103)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.9398/S.8166, to establish the Nail Salon Minimum Standards Act.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish the Nail Salon Minimum Standards Act. (A.9398/S.8166)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City School Construction Authority (SCA) and the New York City Department of Design and Construction (DDC) to reconsider their decision to substitute precast concrete wall panels in place of traditional handset brick and block walls in public projects in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: SCA and DDC to reconsider their decision to substitute precast concrete wall panels in place of traditional handset brick and block walls in public projects in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exit surveys and interviews for resigning and retiring employees of city agencies
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Exit surveys and interviews for resigning and retiring employees of city agencies.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee

Items.MatterName: Establish the Nail Salon Minimum Standards Act. (A.9398/S.8166)
